page.title: 15MEDICAL and SOCIAL SERVICES.
page.content: MEDICAL CARE and SOCIAL SERVICES. The townspeople are{well-catered for}in respect of{Medical and Social care. There are{two major medical practices: one situated at{Abbey End}and the other in new buildings in{Bertie Road having just{moved from}the building known as the{Convalescent Home}in High Street. This{latter surgery}also houses the main{Health Clinic}for the area. There is one{Dental Surgery, one{Chiropodist,}two{Opticians}and one {Acupuncture Clinic}located in the town.{Major National Health}and {Private Hospitals}serving{Kenilworth are{situated}at{Leamington Spa, {Warwick}and{Coventry.}The{Social {Services}offices are{located}in {Warwick Road}in the centre of town and its{Officers and Social Care staff {cater}for people with{all kinds}of {problems}and{special needs.
